Package com.wingfoot.soap.encoding

Interface Summary
SOAPDeserializer Defines the properties that are required for a class to deserialize a SOAP payload.
SOAPSerializer Defines the properties that are required for a class to serialize a SOAP payload.
TypeDeserializer Defines properties that are required to convert a parameter to a Java object based on the rules defined in XML schema.
TypeSerializer Converts a Java Type to XML.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSerializer Converts Java objects to XML stubs that are then part of the SOAP payload.
Base64 Encapsulates a byte array as a Base64 encoded String and vice-versa.
ComplexTypeDeserializer Converts a ComplexType to a JavaBean.
ComplexTypeSerializer  
HexBinary Encapsulates a byte array as a Hexadecimal String and vice-versa.
LiteralDeserializer Takes a SOAP payload that uses literal encoding and converts the parameters to Java parameters.
LiteralSerializer Converts a method and its parameters (Java types) to SOAP payload based on the XML schema provided in the WSDL.
SectionVDeserializer Converts into Java objects,the parameters in a SOAP payload that are encoded using the rules specified in SOAP 1.1 Section V.
SectionVSerializer Converts an Envelope (a.k.a serializes an Envelope) to a SOAP payload based on the rules specifed in SOAP 1.1 Section V.
TypeMappingRegistry Stores association between a Class and its namespace, localpart, serialization class and deserialization class.
